content.content:
#  HR Geckos 
 
##  IT Services and IT Consulting 
 
###  Maryland, MD  2,563 followers 
  Co-pilot for HR operations. HR Helpdesk & Workflow Automation for HR by HR, making HR as agile as a gecko ü¶é!    [Follow](https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fcompany%2Fhrgeckos&fromSignIn=true&trk=top-card_top-card-secondary-button-top-card-secondary-cta)    
  
- [View all 12 employees](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fsearch%2Fresults%2Fpeople%2F%3FfacetCurrentCompany%3D%255B33300415%255D&trk=org-employees_cta_face-pile-cta)
  
                   
##  About us 
    HR Geckos is a 24/7 smart solution that offers a one-stop employee service center with dashboards, analytics, and an intelligent chatbot. With HR Geckos, organizations can centralize HR service delivery and connect the workforce with the tools and information they need to thrive. Businesses achieve cost savings through improved employee engagement, higher retention, and streamlined operations. Our automated solution helps HR teams free themselves from repetitive administrative and paper-driven manual processes that take up over 80% of their time to focus on critical business needs like recruitment, retention, and employee engagement. Key Features: * One-Stop-Shop Employee Service Center * AI Chatbot * Self-Service Support via FAQ Library * Integrated Dashboard for Comprehensive Insights * Employee Handbooks & Policies * Org Charts * Automate HR Workflows * Contact an HR Expert 
    Website   [http://www.hrgeckos.com](https://www.linkedin.com/redir/redirect?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Ehrgeckos%2Ecom&urlhash=4I8i&trk=about_website)      Industry   IT Services and IT Consulting     Company size   2-10 employees     Headquarters   Maryland, MD     Type   Privately Held      Specialties   Chatbot, Dashboard, HR Service Delivery, HR Chatbot, Work Tech, Digital Transformation, Employee Experience, SAAS, Workflow Approvals, Business Process Automation, Business Operation Automation, case management, ticketing system, employee engagement, hr operations, helpdesk, IT Help Desk, and Copilot        
##  Products 
    [HR Geckos‚Ñ¢ - Copilot for HR Ops](https://www.linkedin.com/products/hrgeckos-hr-geckos%E2%84%A2-transform-your-people-operations/)       
###   HR Geckos‚Ñ¢ - Copilot for HR Ops 
  [Human Resources Management Systems (HRMS)](https://www.linkedin.com/products/categories/human-resources-management-systems?trk=organization_guest_main_product_card_category_link)   HR Geckos is a 24/7 smart solution that offers a one-stop employee service center with dashboards, analytics, and an intelligent chatbot. With HR Geckos, organizations can centralize HR service delivery and connect the workforce with the tools and information they need to thrive. Businesses achieve cost savings through improved employee engagement, higher retention, and streamlined operations. Our automated solution helps HR teams free themselves from repetitive administrative and paper-driven manual processes that take up over 80% of their time to focus on critical business needs like recruitment, retention, and employee engagement. Ready to HR like a gecko?! 
         
##  Locations 
   
 
- Primary Maryland, MD, US [Get directions](https://www.bing.com/maps?where=Maryland+MD+US&trk=org-locations_url)

- [### Neha Goel Fractional CMO for HR Tech & B2B SaaS | 16+ yrs driving GTM strategy, demand gen & product marketing | 2‚Äì4x pipeline growth for Series A+ teams](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nehagoelfl?trk=org-employees)
 
- [### Jay Polaki‚ö°Ô∏è SHRM-SCP/SPHR CEO at HRGeckos | Copilot for HR Ops built for HR by HR | Podcast #HRBytes | LinkedIn Top Human Resources Voice](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jpolaki?trk=org-employees)
 
 [See all employees](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fsearch%2Fresults%2Fpeople%2F%3FfacetCurrentCompany%3D%255B33300415%255D&trk=public_biz_employees-join)     
##  Updates 
   
 
- [HR Geckos](https://www.linkedin.com/company/hrgeckos?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_feed-reaction-header) reposted this [HR Geckos](https://www.linkedin.com/company/hrgeckos?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_feed-actor-name) 2,563 followers 2w Edited As the season of spookiness descends upon us, we invite you to partake in some HR Tech Scary Story events we are hosting at HR Geckos. Is your HR Tech Stack bringing out the Frankenstein in you and your team? Or perhaps a broomstick-riding software glitch that left you spellbound in frustration? Share your scariest moments in [#HRTech](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fhrtech&trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card-text) with us and win big! :-) üëáüèΩ Submit your scary story by October 20th to be entered in the drawing. Three drawing winners will receive a magical $50 Starbucks gift card! Share away! [https://lnkd.in/gxhv5YNu](https://lnkd.in/gxhv5YNu?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card-text) P.S. If you recently attended the [#hrtechconf](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fhrtechconf&trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card-text), we're sure you have some stories to share! - [3](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fcompany%2Fhrgeckos&trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_social-actions-reactions) [Like](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fcompany%2Fhrgeckos&trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_like-cta) [Comment](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fcompany%2Fhrgeckos&trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_comment-cta) [Share](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fcompany%2Fhrgeckos&trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_share-cta)
 
- [HR Geckos](https://www.linkedin.com/company/hrgeckos?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_feed-actor-name) 2,563 followers 21h Happening today. Do join the convo if you're in Houston, TX! [HR Geckos](https://www.linkedin.com/company/hrgeckos?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_reshare_feed-actor-name) 2,563 followers 2w AI-Ready or Not: Wind Down, Dine Up, Connect Deep Join HR Geckos + P3 HR Solutions for an evening designed to spark conversation, connection, and the future of work. Seats are limited‚Äîsecure your spot today for a night of discovery, conversation, and collaboration. [https://luma.com/2kbxouwa](https://luma.com/2kbxouwa?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_reshare-text) With warmth, HR Geckos + P3 HR Solutions Teams [Jay Polaki‚ö°Ô∏èSHRM-SCP/SPHR](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jpolaki?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_reshare-text) | [Janell Zeug](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jzeug23?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_reshare-text) | [HR Bytes‚Ñ¢ Community](https://www.linkedin.com/company/hrbytes-community?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_reshare-text) This content isn‚Äôt available here Access this content and more in the LinkedIn app Download the app [Like](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fcompany%2Fhrgeckos&trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_like-cta) [Comment](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fcompany%2Fhrgeckos&trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_comment-cta) [Share](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fcompany%2Fhrgeckos&trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_share-cta)
 
- [HR Geckos](https://www.linkedin.com/company/hrgeckos?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_feed-actor-name) 2,563 followers 1d Edited AI Readiness = Human Readiness AI is accelerating faster than most organizations can adapt. Yet the greatest gap isn‚Äôt technical ‚Äî it‚Äôs cultural and human. Leaders need to ask: ‚Üí Do our people trust these systems? ‚Üí Do they feel empowered or replaced? ‚Üí Are we creating new opportunities for meaning and contribution? Technology evolves quickly. People evolve intentionally. Readiness must include reskilling, empathy, and communication ‚Äî not just implementation. HR isn‚Äôt just a function anymore ‚Äî it‚Äôs a strategic compass guiding how AI integrates into culture, work design, and talent models. We‚Äôre the stewards of how trust, fairness, and inclusion show up in AI-driven decisions ‚Äî from hiring algorithms to performance management. None of us built our organizations to serve technology ‚Äî we built them to serve people (you can disagree!). As AI transforms the way we work, lead, and decide, the real challenge isn‚Äôt technological ‚Äî it‚Äôs human. On Wednesday, we are bringing C-suite leaders together to have the conversation that truly matters: ‚Üí Are we AI-ready ‚Äî or people-ready for AI? Because the future of work isn‚Äôt just automated. It‚Äôs augmented by humanity. If you're a C-suite leader in Houston, TX, join the conversation on Oct...
